page.title: 14WELLINGTON HEATH CLUBS
page.content: All clubs etc. meet in the{Memorial {Hall}which has been{extensively mod- {ernised}over the last ten years with Â£4000 raised by the villagers. New toilets, kitchens amd committee room have been built on and 6 years ago oil fired{central heating}replaced the old Tortoise stove. The{management committee}meets monthly and the school teacher does the secre- tarial work, and books weddings and other parties of which there were 26 last year. {Funding}is handled by the 200 Club. Residents pay Â£1/month, draw 6 prizes and the balance maintains the Hall. In 1981, a{village survey}on "What do you want in the way of activities?" resulted in the formation of a {Gardeners Club}and the founding of an {Annual Flower Show,}and latterly a {film club}was started. Cont.
